reason: Duplicate of q_1_0674 (batch_0038): question '교육전문직에서 교원으로 다시 전직할 수 있나요?' is nearly identical to q_1_0674's '교육전문직원에서 다시 교원으로 돌아갈 수 있나요?'. Same source page, same core answer content covering 원직위 복귀, 5-year/2-year exceptions, 횟수 제한.

Natural question about cross-school-level transfers. Answer correctly synthesizes page 50 line 9: 교원수급상 필요, 교원 희망, 교원자격증 요건. The examples (중등→초등 etc.) are reasonable inferences. source.text verified as substring. Well-structured with clear three-requirement framework.

Duplicate of q_1_0684: question '교원의 학교급별 전직은 가능한가요?' is equivalent to q_1_0684's '교원을 다른 학교급으로 전직시킬 수 있나요?'. Source contains only one sentence on this topic.

Duplicate of q_1_0674 (batch_0038) and q_1_0680 (this batch): same question topic (교육전문직원→교원 전직). Raw structural padding with no synthesis.

Raw dump: answer reproduces the entire page 50 section (가) through (바) plus (2) and (3) almost verbatim with only minimal formatting changes (bullet markers). No synthesis, no value-add over reading the source directly. source.text only covers (가)-(다) but answer dumps the full section.
